comment: CR-060 Pre-Review: COMPLIANT. All verification items pass. FRONTMATTER: title 'Agent Hub Genesis - Core Infrastructure' present and non-empty; revision_summary 'Initial draft' acceptable for v0.1 per SOP-001 Section 5.1. STRUCTURE: All 12 required sections per SOP-002 Section 6 present (Purpose, Scope, Current State, Proposed State, Change Description, Justification, Impact Assessment, Testing Summary, Implementation Plan, Execution, Execution Summary, References). SCOPE: Contains Context, Changes Summary, Files Affected per SOP-002 6.2. IMPACT ASSESSMENT: Contains Files Affected, Documents Affected, Other Impacts per SOP-002 6.7. PLACEHOLDER CONTENT: No TBD/TODO/FIXME/XXX found; bracketed placeholders in Sections 10-11 are execution-phase templates per SOP-002 Section 6. TRACEABILITY: References SOP-001, SOP-002, SOP-005; no parent (genesis work). TYPOS/ERRORS: None found. FORMATTING: Consistent throughout. CONTENT STANDARDS (SOP-001 5.4): No embedded metadata. TU ASSIGNMENT: None required - standalone system, no Flow State code changes. Recommend for approval.

CR-060 Post-Review: NON-COMPLIANT. One deficiency found.

DEFICIENCY: revision_summary field reads 'Initial draft' at version 1.1. Per SOP-001 Section 5.1, revision_summary must be 'Updated each revision cycle to describe changes.' The v1.0 to v1.1 revision cycle added execution results to Sections 10, 10 (Execution Comments), and 11. The revision_summary must be updated to describe the current revision cycle changes (e.g., 'Execution results documented for all 8 EIs').

ALL OTHER ITEMS PASS:
- Execution Complete: All 8 EIs show Task Outcome of Pass.
- Blocking VARs: None required (no failed EIs).
- Documentation Approved: No controlled documents modified (genesis work).
- Evidence Documented: All EI summaries are specific and substantive. Section 11 Execution Summary is present and complete.
- SDLC Prerequisites: N/A (genesis sandbox, no SDLC governance).
- Placeholder Content: All execution-phase placeholders replaced with actual content.
- Pre-Approved Content Integrity (Sections 1-9): Unchanged from pre-approved version.
- Typos/Errors: None found.
- Formatting: Consistent throughout.

ACTION REQUIRED: Update revision_summary frontmatter to describe the v1.1 revision cycle changes, then re-route for post-review.

CR-060 Post-Review Round 2: COMPLIANT. Previously identified deficiency corrected.

DEFICIENCY CORRECTION VERIFIED: revision_summary updated from 'Initial draft' to 'Execution results documented for all 8 EIs' -- accurately describes v1.1 revision cycle changes per SOP-001 Section 5.1. PASS.

POST-REVIEW VERIFICATION (SOP-002 Section 7.3):
1. Execution Complete: All 8 EIs show Task Outcome of Pass. No failed tasks requiring VARs.
2. Blocking VARs: None required (no failed EIs).
3. Documentation Approved: No controlled documents modified (genesis work).
4. Evidence Documented: All EI summaries specific and substantive. Section 11 Execution Summary present and complete.
5. SDLC Prerequisites: N/A (genesis sandbox, no SDLC governance).

ADDITIONAL VERIFICATION:
- Frontmatter: title 'Agent Hub Genesis - Core Infrastructure' present; revision_summary 'Execution results documented for all 8 EIs' present and descriptive.
- Placeholder Content: All execution-phase placeholders replaced with actual content. No TBD/TODO/FIXME/XXX.
- Pre-Approved Content Integrity (Sections 1-9): Unchanged from pre-approved version.
- Typos/Errors: None found.
- Formatting: Consistent throughout.

Recommend for post-approval.
